text: phir unake peechhe hee unake qadam ba qadam apane aur paigambar bheje aur unake peechhe mariyam ke bete eesa ko bheja aur unako injeel ata kee aur jin logon ne unakee pairavee kee unake dilon mein yafakqat aur meharabaanee daal dee aur rahabaaniyat (lajzaat se kinaaraakashee) un logon ne khud ek nayee baat nikaalee thee hamane unako usaka hukm nahin diya tha magar (un logon ne) khuda kee khushanoodee haasil karane kee garaz se (khud eejaad kiya) to usako bhee jaisa banaana chaahie tha na bana sake to jo log unamen se eemaan lae unako hamane unaka ajr diya unamen ke bahutere to badakaar hee hain
